title: Ep. 625 Liberals are Panicking Over This
description:
This piece clearly lays out the real reasons for government deficits. 

This piece debunks silly liberal talking points about the tax cuts.

Liberals are panicking over the growth of conservative media, and their “solutions” are disturbing.

CNN can’t seem to get past their fascination with the “white truck.”

Manufacturing is coming back.

Is school choice 2.0 coming?

 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
